source_objects.title: Social Media Marketing
source_objects.description: Become a Social Media Maven with courses that can increase your social media presence: create a social media strategy, underderstand Facebook, Twitter and more.

items.title: Social Media Bootcamp 101
items.headline: The Best Way For Beginners To Get Started
objectives_summary: Understanding the set up process for social media.
Figuring out who your target audience is and why that's important.
Breaking down what you need to do in the beginning stages during your set up process.

items.title: Telegram Marketing for you!
items.headline: A complete course to learn Telegram
objectives_summary: You will learn how to use the advanced features of Telegram
You will understand how to make money with Telegram
You'll figure out how to promote your brand

items.title: Facebook Group Marketing: 12 Ways To Grow a Facebook Group
items.headline: Learn the 12 strategies me and my students use to grow our Facebook Groups by over 100 members a week... every week
objectives_summary: Facebook Groups, Facebook Group Marketing, Grow Your Facebook Group

items.title: Pinterest Marketing For Creative Entrepreneurs
items.headline: The Power of Pinning for Business Growth
objectives_summary: how to get started and set up your account for success
how to use Pinterest to figure out exactly what your customers want
how to optimize your Pinterest Profile to get clicks to your site or shop

items.title: CONTENT FACTORY Made Easy
items.headline: Build your CONTENT FACTORY, create value, engage and grow your followers, customers and sales. Incl 100.000 articles
objectives_summary: What Content Marketing Mastery is all about and how it can change your life forever.
The deceptively simple method that nobody wants you to know about building massive content quickly and easily without spending a fortune.
The undisclosed content production technique that many internet marketers miss out and why you need to implement this today.

items.title: SEE How Much I EARNED From YouTube in One Month 2021
items.headline: YouTube Audience Growth: Monetized your YouTube channel | Make Money on YouTube Without Making Videos
objectives_summary: How to Monetize their YouTube Channel FAST!
How to earn HUGE Passive income on YouTube (Other 4 different ways to EARN on YouTube)
Learn the Most Profitable Niche with the Highest CPM

items.title: Instagram Reels - How to create reels that go viral
items.headline: How to create reels that go viral
objectives_summary: Instagram marketing
Reels for Instagram
Tutorials on Reels transitions

items.title: Tube Raider: Search Engine Domination With YouTube
items.headline: A Masterclass in Search Engine Domination using videos you post to YouTube
objectives_summary: By the end of this course, you will know how to make Google love your videos and website and how to dominate page #1 of Google for your keywords
Over 8 hours of training and case studies is included in this course

items.title: Social Network Engagement

visible_instructors.name: Freedom
visible_instructors.job_title: Web developer doing awesome things online!
visible_instructors.title: Freedom Portis

items.headline: Learn the basics of social networking and become a pro in two hours.
objectives_summary: Learn how to Tweet in your Sleep
Learn How to get more Likes On Facebook
Become a Pro with Pinterest

items.title: TikTok Crash Course: A Hands-On, From Zero to Hero in TikTok
items.headline: Growth expert sharing real stuff with you about TikTok. We’ll take you from complete newbie to a bonafide TikTok pro.
objectives_summary: Setting up Your Account
Creating Your First Post
How to Make Money on TikTok

items.title: Internet Marketing Strategies
items.headline: Use social media tools, email marketing and landing pages to create a sustainable online business
objectives_summary: Use the various social media tools (Facebook, Twitter, Linked In, Google+, Instagram, Pinterest, Adwords, YouTube) to promote their business (product or service)
Build a website using wordpress
Create a landing page / squeeze page / lead page

items.title: LinkedIn (Advanced): Fast Track Training
items.headline: Learn how to use LinkedIn Advanced methods quickly and easily for yourself or business
objectives_summary: How to master LinkedIn Advanced fast
Generate leads and sales using LinkedIn Advanced strategies
Setup and run LinkedIn Advanced campaigns in any niche

items.title: Social Media Marketing 2020 - Growth Through Collaboration
items.headline: Facebook, Instagram, Youtube & TikTok grow your followers with these strategies based on collaboration.
objectives_summary: Get more likes on Facebook Like Pages
Get more followers on Instagram
Get more subscribers on Youtube

items.title: Instagram Marketing-2021
items.headline: Build a Unique Brand, Build Follower base , Convert Followers to Paying Customers & Much More !!
objectives_summary: Students will Learn how to use Instagram for Marketing.
Students will gain more Confidence in Instagram Marketing in the coming days.
Fear of Failure in Instagram will fade away by the end of the course

items.title: Instagram #2021 for Beginners from A to Z - Intensive course
items.headline: Practical lessons - How to create and promote your page in Instagram
objectives_summary: This course is about the Instagram social network.
- How to create an account
- How to make and design Instagram profile

items.title: Automotive Dynamic Ads
items.headline: Dynamic Ads for dealerships and agencies. Step-by-step instruction for putting live inventory directly into ads.
objectives_summary: Automotive Dynamic Ads
Google Tag Manger
Inventory Feeds and Catalogs
